exposurebracketing: 2 to 5 frames in steps of 1/3, 1/2, 2/3, 1, 2 or 3 EV
exposurecompensation: Can be adjusted by -5 to +5 EV in increments of 1/3 or 1/2 EV in , , and modes
speed: 1/8000 to 30 s in steps of 1/3 or 1/2 EV, bulb, time, X250
monitor: 8-cm/3.2-in., approx. 1229k-dot (VGA; 640 x 480 x 4 = 1,228,800 dots), TFT monitor with approx. 170° viewing angle, approx. 100% frame coverage and brightness adjustment
accessoryterminal: Wireless remote controller: WR-1 and WR-R10 (available separately), Remote cord: MC-DC2 (available separately), GPS unit: GP-1/GP-1A (available separately)
afareamodes: Face-priority AF, wide-area AF, normal-area AF, subject-tracking AF
focuslock: Focus can be locked by pressing shutter-release button halfway (single-servo AF) or by pressing AE-L/AF-L button
adlbracketing: 2 frames using selected value for one frame or 3 frames using preset values for all frames
flashcontrol: TTL: i-TTL flash control using 2016-pixel RGB sensor is available with built-in flash and SB-910, SB-900, SB-800, SB-700, SB-600 or SB-400; i-TTL balanced fill-flash for digital SLR is used with matrix and center-weighted metering, standard i-TTL flash for digital SLR with spot metering
flashreadyindicator: Lights when built-in flash or optional flash unit is fully charged; flashes after flash is fired at full output
compatiblelenses: Compatible with AF NIKKOR lenses, including type G and D lenses (some restrictions apply to PC lenses) and DX lenses, AI-P NIKKOR lenses, and non-CPU AI lenses ( and modes only); IX-NIKKOR lenses, lenses for the F3AF, and non-AI lenses cannot be used The electronic rangefinder can be used with lenses that have a maximum aperture of f/5.6 or faster (the electronic rangefinder supports the center focus point with lenses that have a maximum aperture of f/8 or faster)
exposurelock: Luminosity locked at detected value with AE-L/AF-L button
audioinput: Stereo mini-pin jack (3.5-mm diameter; plug-in power supported)
accessoryshoe: ISO 518 hot-shoe with sync and data contacts and safety lock
weight: Approx. 765 g/1 lb 11.0 oz with battery and memory card but without body cap; approx. 675 g/1 lb 7.8 oz (camera body only)
meteringmode: TTL exposure metering using 2016-pixel RGB sensor
remotecontrolmodesmll3: Delayed remote, quick-response remote, remote mirror-up
batterypack: Optional MB-D15 Multi-Power Battery Pack with one EN-EL15 Rechargeable Li-ion Battery or six AA-size alkaline, Ni-MH or lithium batteries
isosensitivityrecommendedexposureindex: ISO 100 to 6400 in steps of 1/3 EV; can also be set to approx. 0.3, 0.5, 0.7, 1 or 2 EV (ISO 25600 equivalent) above ISO 6400; auto ISO sensitivity control available
selftimer: 2 s, 5 s, 10 s, 20 s; 1 to 9 exposures at intervals of 0.5, 1, 2 or 3 s
doubleslot: Slot 2 can be used for overflow or backup storage or for separate storage of copies created using NEF+JPEG; pictures can be copied between cards
effectiveangleofview: Nikon DX format; focal length in 35mm [135] format equivalent to approx. 1.5x that of lenses with FX-format angle of view
supportedlanguages: Arabic, Bengali, Chinese (Simplified and Traditional), Czech, Danish, Dutch, English, Finnish, French, German, Greek, Hindi, Hungarian, Indonesian, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Persian, Polish, Portuguese (European and Brazilian), Romanian, Russian, Spanish, Swedish, Tamil, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese
flashmodes: Auto, auto with red-eye reduction, auto slow sync, auto slow sync with red-eye reduction, fill-flash, red-eye reduction, slow sync, slow sync with red-eye reduction, rear-curtain with slow sync, rear-curtain sync, off; Auto FP High-Speed Sync supported
builtinflash: , , , , , , , : Auto flash with auto pop-up , , , , : Manual pop-up with button release

operatingenvironment: Temperature: 0 to 40°C/32 to 104°F; humidity: 85% or less (no condensation)

metering: TTL exposure metering using main image sensor
depthoffieldpreview: Pressing depth-of-field preview button stops lens aperture down to value selected by user ( and modes) or by camera (other modes)
releasemodes: S (single frame), CL (continuous low speed), CH (continuous high speed), Q (quiet shutter release), (self-timer), MUP (mirror up); interval timer photography supported
lensmount: Nikon F mount (with AF coupling and AF contacts)
magnification: Approx. 0.94x (50 mm f/1.4 lens at infinity, -1.0 m -1 )
dustreductionsystem: Image Sensor Cleaning, Image Dust Off reference data (optional Capture NX 2 software required)
focusingscreen: Type B BriteView Clear Matte Mark II screen with AF area brackets (framing grid can be displayed)
whitebalancebracketing: 2 to 5 frames in steps of 1, 2 or 3
flashbracketing: 2 to 5 frames in steps of 1/3, 1/2, 2/3, 1, 2 or 3 EV
framesizepixelsandframerate: 1920 x 1080; 60i (59.94 fields/s)/50i (50 fields/s)* 1920 x 1080; 30p (progressive), 25p, 24p 1280 x 720; 60p, 50p Actual frame rates for 60p, 50p, 30p, 25p and 24p are 59.94, 50, 29.97, 25 and 23.976 fps respectively; options support both ★high and normal image quality *Available only when 1.3x (18x12) is selected for image area; sensor output is about 60 or 50 fps
flashsyncspeed: X=1/250 s; synchronizes with shutter at 1/320 s or slower (flash range drops at speeds between 1/250 and 1/320 s)
nikoncreativelightingsystemcls: Advanced Wireless Lighting supported with: SB-910, SB-900, SB-800 or SB-700 as a master flash and SB-600 or SB-R200 as remotes or SU-800 as commander; built-in flash can serve as master flash in commander mode Auto FP High-Speed Sync and modeling illumination supported with all CLS-compatible flash units except SB-400; Flash Color Information Communication and FV lock supported with all CLS-compatible flash units
media: SD (Secure Digital) and UHS-I compliant SDHC and SDXC memory cards
playback: Full-frame and thumbnail (4, 9, or 72 images or calendar) playback with playback zoom, movie playback, photo and/or movie slide shows, histogram display, highlights, photo information, GPS data display and auto image rotation
autofocus: Contrast-detect AF anywhere in frame (camera selects focus point automatically when face-priority AF or subject-tracking AF is selected)
panasonic: 4 GB, 6 GB, 8 GB, 12 GB, 16 GB, 24 GB, 32 GB48 GB, 64 GB
lensservo: Autofocus (AF): Single-servo AF (AF-S); full-time servo AF (AF-F) Manual focus (M)
focuspoint: Can be selected from 51 or 11 focus points
flashcompensation: -3 to +1 EV in increments of 1/3 or 1/2 EV
picturecontrolsystem: Standard, Neutral, Vivid, Monochrome, Portrait, Landscape; selected Picture Control can be modified; storage for custom Picture Controls
imagesizepixels: DX (24x16) image area: 6000 x 4000 [L], 4496 x 3000 [M], 2992 x 2000 [S] 1.3x (18x12) image area: 4800 x 3200 [L], 3600 x 2400 [M], 2400 x 1600 [S] Photographs with image area of DX (24x16) taken in movie live view: 6000 x 3368 [L], 4496 x 2528 [M], 2992 x 1680 [S] Photographs with image area of 1.3x (18x12) taken in movie live view: 4800 x 2696 [L], 3600 x 2024 [M], 2400 x 1344 [S]
activedlighting: Auto, extra high, high, normal, low, off
eyepoint: 19.5 mm (-1.0 m -1 ; from center surface of viewfinder eyepiece lens)
acadapter: EH-5b AC Adapter; requires EP-5B Power Connector (available separately)
modes: Live view photography (still images), movie live view (movies)
exposuremodes: Auto modes ( auto; auto [flash off]); programmed auto with flexible program ( ); shutter-priority auto ( ); aperture-priority auto ( ); manual ( ); scene modes ( portrait; landscape; child; sports; close up; night portrait; night landscape; party/indoor; beach/snow; sunset; dusk/dawn; pet portrait; candlelight; blossom; autumn colors; food); special effects modes ( night vision; color sketch; miniature effect; selective color; silhouette; high key; low key); user settings 1); user settings 2)
rangeiso100f14lens20c68f: Matrix or center-weighted metering: 0 to 20 EV Spot metering: 2 to 20 EV
filesystem: DCF (Design Rule for Camera File System) 2.0, DPOF (Digital Print Order Format), Exif (Exchangeable Image File Format for Digital Still Cameras) 2.3, PictBridge
audiorecordingdevice: Built-in or external stereo microphone; sensitivity adjustable
whitebalance: Auto (2 types), incandescent, fluorescent (7 types), direct sunlight, flash, cloudy, shade, preset manual (up to 6 values can be stored, Spot White Balance measurement available during live view), choose color temperature (2500 K to 10000 K), all with fine-tuning
